attributes.action: Tax exemption for healthcare workers doing extra shifts during covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government/finance secretary to give tax and NI breaks for extra shifts undertaking by healthcare workers during this outbreak. This will help increase the numbers on the frontline fighting this pandemic.
attributes.background: To provide incentive for healthcare workers who are are the forefront of fighting the pandemic. This will help encourage staff to undertake extra shifts as the NHS is struggling to adequately provide staffing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
